name: Illust
intro: App for location based digital experiences
introduce: lllust is a platform for creating and discovering different realities. Creators on Illust use augmented reality tools to place digital content and NFTs in neighborhoods, craft localized messages for friends, and publish interactive games for play. Visitors own their data in PoP (Proof of Presence) tokens and are exchangeable for goods and services from Illust’s creator and brand partners.
